text: I had a great learning experience at ICASTEC College. The instructors were knowledgeable and supportive, and the coursework provided me with practical skills, especially in Food & Beverage and Catering Management. The facilities were well-maintained, and the staff was always helpful. I recommend ICASTEC to anyone looking to upskill or pursue a career in their chosen field.

I have improved my learning and communication skills from the Diploma in Hospitality and Hotel Management course in ICASTEC. All the college staff is very helpful. This college provides best services. My overall experience in ICASTEC is very good.

I had my diploma from this college... Absolutely perfect to learn and have a career in hotel industry. During my studies, I was appointment as a student council where I show my leadership and managerial skills, that was a great position to have. College also provide appreciation letter for this. During my 6 months of study my teacher Mr. Andrew help me alot, he teaches every concept clearly and practically. I appreciate the way of teaching .. it's really interesting .
The staff members were also very helpful Mrs. Seela and Mr. Rodny .. they helped the student every way possible.

After my 6 months of study .. miss. Pui san help me to find my OJT ( on job training)
She found the best suitable for me. I experience so many things .. I used all the theoretical knowledge to my OJT.
She was also there for me during my OJT time. Regular follow ups by miss  pui san always make us feel that college is there for you.
I really had a great experience.

My college is very nice and I learnt many things in my college as well as my course. All teachers are very friendly. My on job training also very good because I learnt so many things there. I am very grateful to have study in ICASTEC.

Just come ICASTEC for bright and sharp future. Because of all staff there very friendly and the way of the teachers teach us very easy and informative. Environment and location of college is also very good. There are all proper need like when go outside of classroom there have computers for us to use for study. THANK YOU, ICASTEC!
